content: your pet s new favorite or most hated sweater the sid sweater is a stretchy sweater for cats or small dogs this quick and easy project is perfect for using yarn scraps to make your pet something cute and cozy materials 60-190 grams of worsted to bulky weight yarn 6 mm circular knitting needles 16 in 6 mm double pointed needles dpns bor stitch marker to determine the correct size take a measurement around the thickest part of your pet in the middle/tummy area to find circumference this sweater design is very stretchy with 4 in of positive ease worked into the pattern there are three size options small medium and chunky in the pattern the corresponding measurements are indicated as s m l small s tummy/middle of 16 in or smaller medium m tummy/middle of 16 - 22 in chunky l tummy/middle of 23 in or larger
